p: Mice (20 ± 5 g) and Male Wistar rats weighing (150 ± 20)g were obtained from the animal house of the Department of Pharmacology and Toxicology, College of Pharmacy, Prince Sattam Bin Abdulaziz University and used for the investigation. The animals were housed under standard controlled conditions (24 ○C and a 12 h light/dark cycle). The animals were provided with standard pellet diet and water ad libitum.
